name: ECHOS (melonllama)
description:
First game is Godot. 

Tried to give an "echoy" feel to everything (sound,  graphics, music) and I am really happy how it turned out visually

The gameplay could have been a been a little better. It's pretty hard if you don't know the layout and it can be pretty unforgiving. 

Please let me know what I can improve upon in the comments below :)
